segments.text: Everything on your application looks really goodâ€”Ohh!
segments.speaker: Joey

segments.text: Just one last question umm, are you and your friends gonna be over here all the time like partying and hanging out?
segments.speaker: Joey

segments.text: Oh don't worry, I'm not really a party girl.
segments.speaker: The Potential Roommate

segments.text: Whoa!! Now look, don't be just blurtin' stuff out. I want you to really think about your answers. Okay?
segments.speaker: Joey

segments.text: You can call off the roommate search!  Hi! I'll be living here.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Oh don't listen to him, he's just some guy who really wants the apartment, but I don't think he's gonna get it.
segments.speaker: Joey

segments.text: Why did you take the shower curtain down?
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: That thing was a hazard!  I'm very safety conscious.
segments.speaker: Joey
